title: "Artificial intelligence reconstructs missing climate information"
excerpt: "An artificial intelligence-based method may infill gaps in historical temperature data more effectively than conventional techniques. Application of this method reveals a stronger global warming trend between 1850 and 2018 than estimated previously."
